title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.15 - Waiver of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 13.15 - Waiver of rules

State Regulations

Any of the foregoing rules may be waived by agreement of the
parties or, if a hearing has convened, by agreement of the parties and with
consent of the hearing officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
13.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
